EmailTemplate.name: Explore Space!
EmailTemplate.subject: Interested in Space? So Are We!
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Lead.Name}, We're so glad to hear you're interested in subscribing to our monthly magazine. To continue on your journey, please visit [PLACEHOLDER URL] to input your payment information and set a recurrence period, or call our number at (555)-867-5309. If you need any help, please visit [PLACEHOLDER URL 2], call our toll-free number at 1-800-SPACEROCKS, or submit a case from the tab on our APOD page. Regards, Explore Space!
